title: Virtual Assistant Needed for Travel Video Research
job_overview:
We are looking for someone to conduct research and assist in creating a list of locations for travel documentaries.

    Skills required:
   - Must understand English;
   - Strong attention to detail and organization skills;

Example of what we expect: Upgrade to see actual info

I will provide you with websites to research footage, and your task will be to create a list of places to visit, such as in Uzbekistan, for example.

If you are looking for a long-term position in our team, please send me a message.

(MUST) Please provide RELEVANT samples of your previous work.

My budget is 400$/month.

!!! Important: MUST have a registered business status (sole trader, freelancer, company, agency, or equivalent) in your country. We cannot work with private individuals who do not have a registered business. 
If you don't know how to register, we will teach you. We have a lot of people from the Philippines who are working full time and legal with us.
